Knicks Fix So how can the Knicks, who play so well against the best teams, get swamped at home by the Kings, who are one of the worst? To quote Amar'e Stoudemire on David Letterman Thursday, Is that a trick question? Actually, no. It was simple. "We don't even need to watch the tape," coach Mike D'Antoni said.
